A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Total hot GARBAGE. Never will I go see another Star Wars movie again. The franchise has saturated the market by producing a movie every year. The story is not consistent and just reused themes from previous Star War movies with a cut and paste job. I think a 5th grade class could have written a better script than what was released. The best inconsequential scene of the movie is milking a four breasted sea walrus and then drinking the milk....lol. They will have to reboot this three part movie to get the franchise back on track.
